info.name: Roblox 2014 (read description)
info.description: I haven't updated this style in years and most of it is probably broken now. Feel free to fork and update it yourself, just credit me please.
info.additionalInfo:
this style WAS an attempt to make roblox look more like it did in 2014.


what's currently been brought back:

-old blue navbar with old R logo
-old catalog (now with dark mode support)
-source sans used as global font
